titles: An elegie vpon my deare brother, the Ionathan of my heart, Mr. Iohn Wheeler, sonne to Sir Edmond Wheeler of Riding Court neare Windsor, in the County of Buckingham, deceased
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[otes] for N. Alsop, and T. Nicholes; and are to be sold at the Angell in Popes head Alley,
notes: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Wheeler, John, --  Mr --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
